title: Forget 10,000 Steps. Here’s How Much Science Says You Actually Need to Walk
description: More movement is better, but something is better than nothing

title: The Science Behind Why We Eat so Much at the Movies
description: Environmental cues help us decide when, how much, and what to chow on when we're at the movies.

title: How Interior Design TikTok Drama Is Raising Questions About Claims of Originality Online
description: A TikTok creator called out a woman for "copying" her designs, opening the floor to questions about inspiration versus idea theft.

title: Trump Is Spooked and His 2024 Rivals Know It
description: The sober reality of nominating a thrice-indicted ex-President is finally sinking in for the GOP. Trump's behavior of late is not helping.

title: With Imran Khan Sent to Jail, Pakistan Faces the Abyss
description: Pakistan’s generals have always called the shots. After Imran Khan’s sentencing, this might change, writes Farzana Shaikh

title: With Imran Khan Sent to Jail, Pakistan Faces the Abyss
description: Pakistan’s generals have always called the shots. After Imran Khan’s sentencing, this might change, writes Farzana Shaikh

title: Beyond Meat’s Stock Slump Raises Questions About Future of Plant-Based Burgers
description: Beyond Meat, once the highflying harbinger of a plant-based meat revolution, took another beating on Wall Street this week.

title: Supreme Court Reinstates Regulation of Ghost Guns
description: Firearms without serial numbers, known as ghost guns, have been turning up at crime scenes across the nation in increasing numbers.

title: Antarctica is Experiencing Extreme Climate Impacts, Say Scientists
description: A new study finds climate change extremes are getting worse in a place that once seemed slightly shielded from global warming’s wildness.

title: Parents Are Almost as Depressed and Anxious as Teens
description: If we want to help anxious and depressed teens, we need to help their parents, too.

title: 3 Reasons Why the Georgia Case Could Stand Out Among Trump’s Legal Woes
description: The case being pursued by Fulton County District Attorney Fani Willis could be the most challenging for Trump, because of factors involving the unique charges and setting.

title: Perfectionists Need to Embrace Failure
description: "Despite all the breathless striving, perfectionism makes us no more likely to succeed," writes Thomas Curran.

title: The Creative Ways Teachers Are Using ChatGPT in the Classroom
description: From trigonometry raps to Shakespeare translation.

title: July Was the World’s Hottest Month on Record by Far, European Scientists Say
description: The European climate monitoring organization officially announced that July 2023 was Earth's hottest month on record by a wide margin.

title: U.S. Backs Diplomacy to Resolve ‘Extremely Troubling’ Niger Crisis
description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said the U.S. is backing regional efforts to bring a diplomatic resolution to the situation in Niger.

title: Imran Khan Seeks Transfer From His ‘Tiny, Dirty’ Pakistan Cell
description: The former Pakistan Prime Minister said he’s been kept in a jail cell meant for terrorists.

title: China Is Testing How Hard It Can Push in the South China Sea Before Someone Pushes Back
description: A Chinese coast guard vessel fired a water cannon at a Philippine ship over the weekend. It isn’t the first time and likely won’t be the last.

title: President Biden to Announce Historic Monument Designation for Grand Canyon
description: Tribes and environmentalists for decades have been trying to safeguard the land north and south of Grand Canyon National Park.

title: Venture Philanthropist Tulaine Montgomery on the Need to Invest in the Unfamiliar
description: When it comes to funding new and innovative ideas, Black women are routinely overlooked. It’s an experience Tulaine Montgomery, CEO of American venture philanthropy organization New Profit, sees regularly and is working to put an end to. “All the stories about scarcity when it comes to racially and ethnically diverse leadership and entrepreneurship—it’s a myth,”…

title: The Mega Millions Jackpot Is Now $1.55 Billion. Here Are Your Odds of Winning It
description: With the almost impossible chance of winning big, experts stress that you shouldn’t spend all your money on lottery tickets.

title: A Russian Jet Was Spotted in North Korea, Raising Concerns Over Possible Arms Deal
description: Neither Russia nor North Korea have reported on the plane, and it is unclear who was aboard.
